Description:
Set up meetings with potential retail and merchant clients to present and demo the service.
Close new sales opportunities through networking and cold calling.
Manage existing clients to ensure maintaining active base and contract renewals.
Report sales pipeline and daily performance.Skills
Skills: No technical IT background or degree is required, as we offer full training and orientation, but:

MUST have hands-on experience with a proven track record selling SaaS.
MUST have experience selling SaaS or POS in Retail Consumer Outlets (Such as: cafes, restaurants, pharmacies, department stores, independent merchant stores and the likes).
MUST have a network of ‘ready-to-approach’ clients list.
ONLY applicants that meet the above requirements will be considered.

Data.Company Industry: IT Services; Installation & Technical Services; Business Support Services
